20110120230046.000|20110120230048.000|TR0|hundreds of federal agents, see and local 
20110120230048.000|20110120230050.000|TR0|police fanning out in the Northeast this 
20110120230050.000|20110120230052.000|TR0|morning and swooping in on alleged crime 
20110120230052.000|20110120230055.000|TR0|bosses and underlings from seven Mafia 
20110120230055.000|20110120230057.000|TR0|families.  They made more than 100 arrests.
20110120230057.000|20110120230059.000|TR0|
20110120230059.000|20110120230102.000|TR0|CNN's Mary Snow has the breakdown on this 
20110120230102.000|20110120230104.000|TR0|massive, massive takedown.
20110120230104.000|20110120230106.000|TR0|

20110120230109.000|20110120230111.000|TR0|
20110120230111.000|20110120230113.000|TR0|MARY SNOW, CNN CORRESPONDENT:  Well, Wolf, 
20110120230113.000|20110120230115.000|TR0|in all, 125 suspects were taken into 
20110120230115.000|20110120230118.000|TR0|custody today.  The bulk of the arrests 
20110120230118.000|20110120230120.000|TR0|were made here in New York.  But there are 
20110120230120.000|20110120230122.000|TR0|suspects from New Jersey, Rhode Island and 
20110120230122.000|20110120230125.000|TR0|one in Italy.
20110120230125.000|20110120230127.000|TR0|
20110120230127.000|20110120230129.000|TR0|Attorney General Eric Holder say the 
20110120230129.000|20110120230132.000|TR0|crimes include what he terms classic mob 
20110120230132.000|20110120230134.000|TR0|hits to eliminate perceived rivals to 
20110120230134.000|20110120230136.000|TR0|truly senseless murders.  And he calls 
20110120230136.000|20110120230138.000|TR0|this a major operation.
20110120230138.000|20110120230141.000|TR0|

20110120230148.000|20110120230150.000|TR0|names sound right out of an episode out 
20110120230150.000|20110120230152.000|TR0|"The Sopranos," "Vinny Carwash," "Johnny 
20110120230152.000|20110120230155.000|TR0|Bandana," "Meatball."
20110120230155.000|20110120230157.000|TR0|
20110120230157.000|20110120230159.000|TR0|While it might have seemed organized crime 
20110120230159.000|20110120230201.000|TR0|families were losing their influence, 
20110120230201.000|20110120230204.000|TR0|becoming the stuff of fiction, the FBI -- 
20110120230204.000|20110120230206.000|TR0|it's a myth that the mob is a thing of the 
20110120230206.000|20110120230208.000|TR0|past, and Attorney General Eric Holder 
20110120230208.000|20110120230211.000|TR0|made a high-profile trip to New York to 
20110120230211.000|20110120230213.000|TR0|underscore that point.
20110120230213.000|20110120230215.000|TR0|
20110120230215.000|20110120230218.000|TR0|ERIC HOLDER, U.S. ATTORNEY GENERAL:  It is 
20110120230218.000|20110120230220.000|TR0|probably not nationwide in the scope, its 
20110120230220.000|20110120230222.000|TR0|impact as it once was.  But the reality 
20110120230222.000|20110120230224.000|TR0|is, it is an ongoing threat, a major 
20110120230224.000|20110120230227.000|TR0|threat to this the economic well- being of 
20110120230227.000|20110120230229.000|TR0|this country, in addition to being the 
20110120230229.000|20110120230231.000|TR0|violent organization.
20110120230231.000|20110120230234.000|TR0|
20110120230234.000|20110120230236.000|TR0|SNOW:  More than 120 alleged mobsters were 
20110120230236.000|20110120230238.000|TR0|arrested in three states, and one in Italy 
20110120230238.000|20110120230241.000|TR0|-- 16 indictments lay out charges that 
20110120230241.000|20110120230243.000|TR0|range from a 1981 murder in a New York bar 
20110120230243.000|20110120230245.000|TR0|to illegal gambling, to extortion and 
20110120230245.000|20110120230247.000|TR0|labor racketeering, including a case where 
20110120230247.000|20110120230250.000|TR0|union members allegedly passed along 
20110120230250.000|20110120230252.000|TR0|Christmas bonuses to crime families.
20110120230252.000|20110120230254.000|TR0|

20110120230257.000|20110120230259.000|TR0|question is why the massive sweep with 
20110120230259.000|20110120230301.000|TR0|cases dating back decades.
20110120230301.000|20110120230304.000|TR0|

20110120230306.000|20110120230308.000|TR0|Division.  She cites the scope of the 
20110120230308.000|20110120230310.000|TR0|investigation and cooperation between 
20110120230310.000|20110120230313.000|TR0|agencies.

20110120230324.000|20110120230327.000|TR0|

20110120230329.000|20110120230331.000|TR0|tools in its toolbox, including informants

20110120230333.000|20110120230336.000|TR0|an unprecedented crackdown, William 
20110120230336.000|20110120230338.000|TR0|Bastone doubts it will put a huge dent in 
20110120230338.000|20110120230340.000|TR0|mob operations.  Bastone is a journalist 
20110120230340.000|20110120230343.000|TR0|who has covered the mob for more than 20

20110120230456.000|20110120230459.000|TR0|
20110120230459.000|20110120230501.000|TR0|ELIOT SPITZER, CO-HOST, "PARKER SPITZER":  
20110120230501.000|20110120230503.000|TR0|Well, Wolf, I think it is more impressive 
20110120230503.000|20110120230505.000|TR0|in terms of number than in terms of its 
20110120230505.000|20110120230508.000|TR0|ultimate impact on the mob.
20110120230508.000|20110120230510.000|TR0|
20110120230510.000|20110120230512.000|TR0|I think Bill Bastone is correct.  Every 
20110120230512.000|20110120230515.000|TR0|year, two years, five years, there's a 
20110120230515.000|20110120230517.000|TR0|major announcement.  We announce we have 
20110120230517.000|20110120230519.000|TR0|arrested, charged 100 alleged mobsters.  
20110120230519.000|20110120230522.000|TR0|The mob continues to come back.
20110120230522.000|20110120230524.000|TR0|
20110120230524.000|20110120230526.000|TR0|Just think of the movies that have come 
20110120230526.000|20110120230528.000|TR0|out of this, from "The Godfather," to 
20110120230528.000|20110120230531.000|TR0|"Goodfellas," to "The Sopranos."  The fact 
20110120230531.000|20110120230533.000|TR0|that there are movies made about the mob 
20110120230533.000|20110120230535.000|TR0|every five years tell you it's still 
20110120230535.000|20110120230538.000|TR0|there, even though prosecutors -- and I 
20110120230538.000|20110120230540.000|TR0|was one of them -- will tell you every 
20110120230540.000|20110120230542.000|TR0|five years we have taken off the top 
20110120230542.000|20110120230545.000|TR0|leadership, decapitated it.
20110120230545.000|20110120230547.000|TR0|
20110120230547.000|20110120230549.000|TR0|So I think Bill Bastone is correct about 
20110120230549.000|20110120230551.000|TR0|that.  Having said that, the crimes that 
20110120230551.000|20110120230554.000|TR0|are charged in these multiple indictments 
20110120230554.000|20110120230556.000|TR0|are street level crimes.  There's murder 
20110120230556.000|20110120230558.000|TR0|in there.  But most of it is extortion, a 
20110120230558.000|20110120230601.000|TR0|bit of drugs, a lot of street level stuff.
20110120230601.000|20110120230603.000|TR0|
20110120230603.000|20110120230605.000|TR0|The sorts of systemic crimes that were 
20110120230605.000|20110120230608.000|TR0|charged against the mob a couple years 
20110120230608.000|20110120230610.000|TR0|ago, where they controlled entire 
20110120230610.000|20110120230612.000|TR0|industries, are not in these indictments.  
20110120230612.000|20110120230614.000|TR0|And the reason for that I think is that 
20110120230614.000|20110120230617.000|TR0|those tentacles of the mob have in fact 
20110120230617.000|20110120230619.000|TR0|been cut off and eliminated.
20110120230619.000|20110120230621.000|TR0|
20110120230621.000|20110120230624.000|TR0|BLITZER:  A lot of us remember back in 
20110120230624.000|20110120230626.000|TR0|2002 when you went after the Gambino 
20110120230626.000|20110120230628.000|TR0|family with indictments.
20110120230628.000|20110120230631.000|TR0|
20110120230631.000|20110120230633.000|TR0|Why is it impossible to break up the Mafia?
20110120230633.000|20110120230635.000|TR0|
20110120230635.000|20110120230637.000|TR0|SPITZER:  Well, look, it is an organic 
20110120230637.000|20110120230640.000|TR0|organization.  And it preys upon, in terms 
20110120230640.000|20110120230642.000|TR0|of its street lending, the sort of -- the 
20110120230642.000|20110120230644.000|TR0|loan- sharking component of organized 
20110120230644.000|20110120230647.000|TR0|crime, which is its bread and butter, 
20110120230647.000|20110120230649.000|TR0|where they make $50, $100 a week on the 
20110120230649.000|20110120230651.000|TR0|vig, there will always be people seeking 
20110120230651.000|20110120230654.000|TR0|money from loan sharks.
20110120230654.000|20110120230656.000|TR0|
20110120230656.000|20110120230658.000|TR0|And that's where organized crime preys on 
20110120230658.000|20110120230700.000|TR0|the most vulnerable of our population.  
20110120230700.000|20110120230703.000|TR0|Sometimes it's organized along different 
20110120230703.000|20110120230705.000|TR0|ethnic lines.  But it will always be 
20110120230705.000|20110120230707.000|TR0|there.  And that's why prosecutors will 
20110120230707.000|20110120230710.000|TR0|continue to be vigilant.
20110120230710.000|20110120230712.000|TR0|
20110120230712.000|20110120230714.000|TR0|Now, there was another aspect of organized 
20110120230714.000|20110120230717.000|TR0|crime, what I called the 
20110120230717.000|20110120230719.000|TR0|white-collarization where they moved into 
20110120230719.000|20110120230721.000|TR0|trucking, they moved into the concrete 
20110120230721.000|20110120230723.000|TR0|industry, the fish market here in New York 
20110120230723.000|20110120230726.000|TR0|City, and essentially formed the 
20110120230726.000|20110120230728.000|TR0|monopolies.  And they said, you know what, 
20110120230728.000|20110120230730.000|TR0|we would rather be John D. Rockefeller, 
20110120230730.000|20110120230733.000|TR0|taking 10 percent off the top of 
20110120230733.000|20110120230735.000|TR0|everything, an entire industry.
20110120230735.000|20110120230737.000|TR0|
20110120230737.000|20110120230740.000|TR0|And that's how they made a lot of money, 
20110120230740.000|20110120230742.000|TR0|when John Gotti was the boss, when Paul 
20110120230742.000|20110120230744.000|TR0|Castellano was the boss of the Gambino 
20110120230744.000|20110120230746.000|TR0|family.  That type of activity has been 
20110120230746.000|20110120230749.000|TR0|eliminated, which is why to a certain 
20110120230749.000|20110120230751.000|TR0|extent they have been pushed back to the 
20110120230751.000|20110120230753.000|TR0|street level extortion and loan- sharking 
20110120230753.000|20110120230756.000|TR0|and drug running that's the guts of these 
20110120230756.000|20110120230758.000|TR0|indictments.
20110120230758.000|20110120230800.000|TR0|
20110120230800.000|20110120230803.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Basically what I hear you saying 
20110120230803.000|20110120230805.000|TR0|they can arrest 100 or 200 guys every few 
20110120230805.000|20110120230807.000|TR0|years.  But in five or 10 years from now, 
20110120230807.000|20110120230809.000|TR0|we're going to have the exact same 
20110120230809.000|20110120230812.000|TR0|conversation.
20110120230812.000|20110120230814.000|TR0|
20110120230814.000|20110120230816.000|TR0|SPITZER:  Well, you know, the names may 
20110120230816.000|20110120230819.000|TR0|change.
20110120230819.000|20110120230821.000|TR0|
20110120230821.000|20110120230823.000|TR0|And I hate to say this and categorize 
20110120230823.000|20110120230826.000|TR0|anything ethnically.  But the ethnicities 
20110120230826.000|20110120230828.000|TR0|also change in terms of organized crime.  
20110120230828.000|20110120230830.000|TR0|Hollywood and "The Godfather" sort of 
20110120230830.000|20110120230832.000|TR0|created an aura around what's called the 
20110120230832.000|20110120230835.000|TR0|traditional organized crime, La Cosa 
20110120230835.000|20110120230837.000|TR0|Nostra.
20110120230837.000|20110120230839.000|TR0|
20110120230839.000|20110120230842.000|TR0|A lot of other types of organized crime, 
20110120230842.000|20110120230844.000|TR0|from Asia to the Caribbean, Latin America, 
20110120230844.000|20110120230846.000|TR0|that have embedded themselves in drugs to 
20110120230846.000|20110120230849.000|TR0|even Wall Street at different times.  And 
20110120230849.000|20110120230851.000|TR0|so, yes, organized crime will never 
20110120230851.000|20110120230853.000|TR0|totally disappear.  The sorts of cases 
20110120230853.000|20110120230855.000|TR0|that were announced today by Eric Holder 
20110120230855.000|20110120230858.000|TR0|clearly are important in pushing back 
20110120230858.000|20110120230900.000|TR0|against it and controlling it, 
20110120230900.000|20110120230902.000|TR0|constraining it, and forcing it to adjust 
20110120230902.000|20110120230905.000|TR0|in the face of all these prosecutions.
20110120230905.000|20110120230907.000|TR0|
20110120230907.000|20110120230909.000|TR0|BLITZER:  I'm sure Eliot will have a lot

20110120230925.000|20110120230928.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Tomorrow, Congresswoman 
20110120230928.000|20110120230930.000|TR0|Gabrielle Giffords will be moved from a 
20110120230930.000|20110120230932.000|TR0|Tucson hospital to a rehabilitation 
20110120230932.000|20110120230935.000|TR0|facility in Houston, just under two weeks 
20110120230935.000|20110120230937.000|TR0|after she was shot in the head in the 
20110120230937.000|20110120230939.000|TR0|Tucson shooting rampage.
20110120230939.000|20110120230941.000|TR0|
20110120230941.000|20110120230944.000|TR0|She stood for the first time yesterday and 
20110120230944.000|20110120230946.000|TR0|today doctors were planning to let her sit 
20110120230946.000|20110120230948.000|TR0|outside.  Like all of us, her husband, the 
20110120230948.000|20110120230951.000|TR0|astronaut Mark Kelly, is amazed at her 
20110120230951.000|20110120230953.000|TR0|recovery so far.  He calls her a fighter, 
20110120230953.000|20110120230955.000|TR0|but he's still shocked at the 
20110120230955.000|20110120230958.000|TR0|circumstances.

20110120231000.000|20110120231002.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)
20110120231002.000|20110120231004.000|TR0|
20110120231004.000|20110120231007.000|TR0|MARK KELLY, HUSBAND OF CONGRESSWOMAN 
20110120231007.000|20110120231009.000|TR0|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS:  I don't think we're 
20110120231009.000|20110120231011.000|TR0|ever going to fully understand the why and 
20110120231011.000|20110120231014.000|TR0|the how and the reason for what happened 
20110120231014.000|20110120231016.000|TR0|on the 8th of January.
20110120231016.000|20110120231018.000|TR0|
20110120231018.000|20110120231021.000|TR0|It's a loss of innocent life, the injury 
20110120231021.000|20110120231023.000|TR0|of a dozen people, the death of a 
20110120231023.000|20110120231025.000|TR0|nine-year-old girl, a federal judge, and 
20110120231025.000|20110120231027.000|TR0|the serious, traumatic injury to my wife, 
20110120231027.000|20110120231030.000|TR0|Gabrielle.  So, we will never fully 
20110120231030.000|20110120231032.000|TR0|understand that.
20110120231032.000|20110120231034.000|TR0|
20110120231034.000|20110120231037.000|TR0|I'm extremely hopeful that Gabby is going 
20110120231037.000|20110120231039.000|TR0|to make a full recovery.  I have told her 
20110120231039.000|20110120231041.000|TR0|that.  She recognizes it.  She's a strong 
20110120231041.000|20110120231044.000|TR0|person, a fighter.  She's a fighter like

20110120231756.000|20110120231758.000|TR0|kidnapped back in 1987.  She was just 19 
20110120231758.000|20110120231801.000|TR0|days old.  And it was because of her own

20110120231853.000|20110120231856.000|TR0|Carlina White, an infant from Harlem, 
20110120231856.000|20110120231858.000|TR0|again just 19 days old, was taken to the 
20110120231858.000|20110120231900.000|TR0|hospital for a fever.  She was kidnapped 
20110120231900.000|20110120231903.000|TR0|by a woman posing as a nurse.  It stunned

20110120232030.000|20110120232032.000|TR0|Missing and Exploited Children.
20110120232032.000|20110120232035.000|TR0|
20110120232035.000|20110120232037.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)
20110120232037.000|20110120232039.000|TR0|
20110120232039.000|20110120232042.000|TR0|ERNIE ALLEN, CEO, NATIONAL CENTER FOR 
20110120232042.000|20110120232044.000|TR0|MISSING AND EXPLOITED CHILDREN:  She 
20110120232044.000|20110120232046.000|TR0|called us around Christmas.  And she 
20110120232046.000|20110120232048.000|TR0|conveyed the sense that she was suspicious 
20110120232048.000|20110120232051.000|TR0|about who she was and where she was.  Our 
20110120232051.000|20110120232053.000|TR0|call taker took a lot of information, 
20110120232053.000|20110120232055.000|TR0|asked a lot of questions, gathered facts 
20110120232055.000|20110120232058.000|TR0|and details, and then our analysts went to 
20110120232058.000|20110120232100.000|TR0|work on the case.

20110120233155.000|20110120233158.000|TR0|is the culture of violence.  And what I

20110120234117.000|20110120234119.000|TR0|reaction from Osama bin Laden to word that 
20110120234119.000|20110120234121.000|TR0|Pearl had been kidnapped and killed.       
20110120234121.000|20110120234124.000|TR0|TODD:  Really fascinating part of this 
20110120234124.000|20110120234126.000|TR0|report.  Khalid Sheikh Mohammed had said 
20110120234126.000|20110120234128.000|TR0|he wanted to exploit Pearl's murder for 
20110120234128.000|20110120234130.000|TR0|propaganda. But according to the report, a 
20110120234130.000|20110120234133.000|TR0|detainee at Guantanamo told interrogators 
20110120234133.000|20110120234135.000|TR0|that when bin Laden found out about how 
20110120234135.000|20110120234137.000|TR0|brutally and publicly Mohammad had killed 
20110120234137.000|20110120234140.000|TR0|Daniel Pearl, he was very angry.  He said

20110120234144.000|20110120234147.000|TR0|brutal and public nature by which Mohammad 
20110120234147.000|20110120234149.000|TR0|allegedly killed Daniel Pearl.
20110120234149.000|20110120234151.000|TR0|
20110120234151.000|20110120234153.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Sending planes into two 
20110120234153.000|20110120234156.000|TR0|buildings and killing 3,000 people, not so 
20110120234156.000|20110120234158.000|TR0|brutal.
20110120234158.000|20110120234200.000|TR0|
20110120234200.000|20110120234203.000|TR0|TODD:  I guess that -- it was OK to bring 
20110120234203.000|20110120234205.000|TR0|attention to al Qaeda that way.
20110120234205.000|20110120234207.000|TR0|
20110120234207.000|20110120234210.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Yes.
20110120234210.000|20110120234212.000|TR0|
20110120234212.000|20110120234214.000|TR0|TODD:  But not -- not the way he killed
